long_description: from bespoke web design, ppc management, seo and social media marketing, we do the lot. web design designing websites is no different to designing anything else that requires functionality. your site is your company's face in the digital world. and that old saying "first impressions last" couldn't be more accurate when it comes to securing your reputation in virtual space, aka, the internet. if you're looking for web design in leeds, talk to us. search engine optimisation, in a nutshell, is the process of increasing the visibility of a web page or a website in a search engine's unpaid results. this is also known as "organic" or "natural" results. we are an seo leeds company, and we are experts in both. if you're looking for web design in leeds, talk to us. pay per click or ppc is a traffic generating concept where advertisers pay a fee every time their ad is clicked. its a way of buying traffic to your site as opposed to "earned" traffic from organic rankings. the most popular version of ppc is search engine advertising. this method essentially allows the advertiser to bid for an ad placement within the search engine's "sponsored ads" segment.
